item.title: Mod lock
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Cool, did you also fix the tens of hundreds of anti leeches allowing me to log onto a server with a certain IP and crash it, ban all players, spawn any items, kill everyone in the server, and more anti leechs?

There are anti leeches on the combat, shops, objects, log in, action buttons, commands, npc options, and lots of things more. “Heroxsword” fixed all these things in his server “Dark Room”
